dict.string: FrameHub needs access to your HomeKit devices to control lights, thermostats, locks, and other smart home accessories from this control panel.
FrameHub uses the camera for optional motion detection to wake the screen when you approach. No images are stored or transmitted.
FrameHub accesses your photo library to display photos in the screensaver mode, helping prevent screen burn-in. Photos are only displayed locally and never uploaded.
FrameHub uses your approximate location to display weather information. Location data is only used for weather and is not stored or shared.
